channel.title: Comments on: PIC16F628 8 RGB LED Controller
channel.description: Intermediate in flow properties between solids and liquids; highly viscous.

item.title: By: Tejas
item.dc:creator: Tejas
item.description:
Hi...! I'm building a pov with single color led. I've used a shift register 74hc595. I've built complete circuit. The only thing remaining is the pic program. I have pickit 2 and i use mplab for programming. I've tried a lot but i didn't get the pov text. I'm using 16 led's with 2 shift registers. Can anyone please help me with the program in mplab? I need it for my college project. My email id- tejabhang92@gmail.com
Thanks in advance...!
item.content:encoded:
Hi…!
I’m building a pov with single color led. I’ve used a shift register 74hc595. I’ve built complete circuit. The only thing remaining is the pic program. I have pickit 2 and i use mplab for programming. I’ve tried a lot but i didn’t get the pov text. I’m using 16 led’s with 2 shift registers. Can anyone please help me with the program in mplab? I need it for my college project.
My email id- tejabhang92@gmail.com

Thanks in advance…!

item.title: By: rhoderik
item.dc:creator: rhoderik
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2006/01/31/pic16f628-8-rgb-led-controller/#comment-21949">rhoderik</a>.
Ooops, I posted it in the wrong place. It is related to the Pic12f629 1 RGB Led controller!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to rhoderik.

Ooops, I posted it in the wrong place. It is related to the Pic12f629 1 RGB Led controller!

item.title: By: rhoderik
item.dc:creator: rhoderik
item.description:
Hello, I'm interested in this project, I want to learn how to do PWM in software using this, but it give me errors at compiling your (unmodified) source code. Theese are the errors: 1RGBLED.jal:1: cannot open 'f675_4i.jal' 1RGBLED.jal:3: cannot open 'nibsbps.jal' 1RGBLED.jal:16: "osc_calibrate" not defined 1RGBLED.jal:16: unexpected token: osc_calibrate
I don't know how to fix the errors, can you help me?
item.content:encoded:
Hello, I’m interested in this project, I want to learn how to do PWM in software using this, but it give me errors at compiling your (unmodified) source code.
Theese are the errors:
1RGBLED.jal:1: cannot open ‘f675_4i.jal’
1RGBLED.jal:3: cannot open ‘nibsbps.jal’
1RGBLED.jal:16: “osc_calibrate” not defined
1RGBLED.jal:16: unexpected token: osc_calibrate

I don’t know how to fix the errors, can you help me?

item.title: By: Vertilka
item.dc:creator: Vertilka
item.description:
Hi, I need to control 100 RGB LEDs, each with different color (let say that the color values are taken from data in memory). the color should change every 50 milliseconds. what is the best way to do that ?
TNX, Vertilka
item.content:encoded:
Hi,
I need to control 100 RGB LEDs, each with different color (let say that the color values are taken from data in memory).
the color should change every 50 milliseconds.
what is the best way to do that ?

TNX,
Vertilka

item.title: By: Galiza
item.dc:creator: Galiza
item.description:
Hi,
I'm trying to build a rgb led POV, but I don't know in what frequency the engine has to spin to produce an image by POV, and don't know how to control what word will appear...can you help me? I mean, with the schematic and the code shown, can I make one of this things? (I'm a rookie in eletronics/PIC programming) Thanks
Filipe Galiza
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

I’m trying to build a rgb led POV, but I don’t know in what frequency the engine has to spin
to produce an image by POV, and don’t know how to control what word will appear…can you help me? I mean, with the schematic and the code shown, can I make one of this things?
(I’m a rookie in eletronics/PIC programming)
Thanks

Filipe Galiza
